title: Soldier's Heart
description: Can they build a life together when his soldier’s heart comes between them?Noah Andrews, a soldier with the Ohio Seventh Regiment can’t wait to get home now that his three year enlistment is coming to an end. He plans to start a new life with his young wife.Molly was only sixteen when she married her hero husband. She prayed every day for him to return home safe and take over the burden of running a farm. But they can’t keep the war from following Noah home.This Inspirational Civil War romance gives the reader a taste of what it was like for the soldiers coming home from the war with PTSD.
author: Tamera Lynn Kraft
